info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COLUMBIANA...SOUTHERN MERCER... NORTHWESTERN BEAVER...SOUTHWESTERN VENANGO...LAWRENCE AND NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vienna Center to 6 miles south of Lordstown to near Canton. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Hermitage, Sharon, Salem, Grove City, Columbiana, East Palestine, Sharpsville, Farrell, Minerva, Slippery Rock, and Ohioville. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 106 and 122. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 30. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 4 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
